Plot: Astronaut Scorch Supernova finds himself caught in a trap when he responds to an SOS from a notoriously dangerous alien planet.
Title: Escape from Planet Earth
Writer: Bob Barlen, Cal Brunker, Tony Leech (story), Cory Edwards (story), Stephen Fry (additional story material)
Actors: Brendan Fraser, Rob Corddry, Ricky Gervais, Jonathan Morgan Heit
